songs.title: King Capital Preview*
songs.lyrics:
The lyrics will be completed upon the release of "King Capital". Stay tuned

[Snippet]
..Tough, actin' softer than chrysanthemum
How STEEZ spit crack and don't support drug abuse?
More trivial than the riddles from mother goose
Kind of odd, but he does quite the job
And he still  keep it underground like a lightning rod
Had the strong arm now I got-
